causes: address issues (virtual office, shared space, residential visibility problems)
policy violations (ineligible business type, keyword stuffing)
immediate_actions: review recent edits and revert risky changes
validate NAP consistency across site and citations
prepare proof documents (license, utility bill, signage, photos)
submit reinstatement with precise, consistent information
mistakes: submitting weak proof or mismatched documentation
prevention: use correct categories and avoid misleading keywords
limit edits and keep a change log
maintain real-world proof assets (photos, signage, docs)
faqs: Why was my Google Business Profile suspended?
What proof is required for reinstatement?
Should I edit my listing while suspended?
How do I prevent future suspensions?
